summary: The Dark Web Interdiction Act of 2025 aims to combat the distribution of opioids through the dark web. It defines the term 'dark web,' makes it illegal to distribute controlled substances through it, and mandates enhanced penalties. The bill establishes a Joint Criminal Opioid and Darknet Enforcement Task Force to investigate, disrupt, and dismantle illicit marketplaces. It outlines the task force's duties, including training, information sharing, and international collaboration. The bill also requires reports on the use of virtual currencies in opioid distribution and a five-year review of the dark web definition.
